org.spongepowered.api.event.inventory

Interface CraftItemEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, ContainerEvent, ViewerEvent

    public interface CraftItemEvent
extends ViewerEvent, Cancellable
    A CraftItemEvent is fired when an item is crafted from a player inventory or workbench inventory, or any other crafting inventory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CraftingInventory getInventory()
      Retrieves the CraftingInventory involved with this event.
      Recipe getRecipe()
      Retrieves the recipe that has been crafted as a result of this event.
      java.util.List<ItemStack> getResults()
      Gets the ItemStacks that are a result of this crafting event.
      java.util.List<ItemType> getResultTypes()
      Gets the types of the results of this crafting event.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.inventory.ViewerEvent

        getViewer

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.inventory.ContainerEvent

        getContainer

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.util.event.Cancellable

        isCancelled, setCancelled
